this_title: คินน์พอร์ช เดอะซีรีส์ Pilot
trans_title: 黑帮少爷爱上我 试播
Rak Khot Rai Sut Thai Khot Rak Pilot
รักโครตร้ายสุดท้ายโครตรัก Pilot
黑帮罗曼史 先导集
黑道少爷的保镖情人 试播集
introduction: Kinn Anakin, The leader of a mafia family was ambushed by the enemy and suffered serious injuries. He braved the rain and got into Porsche Phachara, a student at a certain university. He worked as a part-time waiter, while Porsche only cared about his own affairs and didn't care about the situation.Kinn proposed that if Porsche could help him escape, he would pay him a large sum of money. Porsche accepted his proposal and helped him (Porsche is the national judo champion). Kinn was impressed and hoped that Porsche could be his bodyguard. Porsche refused, but Kinn wouldn't let him go easily.Porsche was threatened by Kinn himself. He leaned against the wall and had no choice but to become Kinn's bodyguard. He doesn't want to be a part of this dangerous world because he's afraid of the only person he loves, his little brother, Porche Pitchaya, Will get involved in this dangerous world. Porsche had to accept Kinn's absurd agreement to live in his house.As Kinn's bodyguard, Porsche will find himself in unimaginable situations. His relationship with Kinn also began to become special. But it's not easy for them, many obstacles are waiting to test their relationship
chinese_title: 黑帮少爷爱上我 试播
foreign_title: คินน์พอร์ช เดอะซีรีส์ Pilot
